messages.body:
Hi {{2.properties_value.`Full Name`[].plain_text}},
Im Ilya Baimetov, COO/CTO at ChemDiv

ChemDiv helps advance/unlock tough/undruggable programs with AI/ML-powered SBDD/FBDD, multi-trillion-scale structural space exploration, predictive ADMET/PK modeling, and translational biomarker tools.

Our expertise spans cell-surface receptor modulators, allosteric kinase and phosphatase pockets, and proteinprotein interaction interfaces, using reversible, covalent, and molecular glue/degrader modalities.

In the last 3 years, we advanced several tough targets to clinic. We work in clearly defined quarterly blocks.

Would you be open to a brief 30-minute Zoom? https://calendly.com/olena-chemdiv/30min

mapper.html:
Dear {{2.properties_value.`Full Name`[].plain_text}},

I'm Olena Khanasyk, Business Development Manager at ChemDiv.

ChemDiv can help advance/unlock tough/undruggable programs that may have stalled internally. Our expertise spans cell-surface receptor modulators, allosteric kinase and phosphatase pockets, and proteinprotein interaction interfaces, using reversible, covalent, and molecular glue/degrader modalities.

We rapidly move early programs toward tangible experimental success, using AI/ML-powered SBDD/FBDD, multi-trillion-scale structural space exploration, predictive ADMET/PK modeling, and translational biomarker tools.

Recent successes include advancing:

  • a first-in-class MALT1 degrader; panKRAS molecular glue
  • a best-in-class superselective BCL2 inhibitor
  • an oral PTPN2 inhibitor; a reversible panEGFR inhibitor;
  • superselective JAK2/V617F, MEN1/JUND PPI, brain-penetrant CDK2 inhibitor and CDK4 covalent glue; TYK2 inhibitor, D1 PAM, 5-HT7 antagonist, LRRK2, and systemic and CNS NLRP3 inhibitors, most of which reached the clinic within the past 3 years.

We work in flexible quarterly project blocks, scaling/pivoting based on experimental outcomes with clear go/kill gates.

Would you be open to a brief 30-minute Zoom with me to discuss how this model could address one of your current "tough target" programs?

Please grab a time that works for you here: https://calendly.com/olena-chemdiv/30min

Warm regards,
Olena Khanasyk
mapper.subject: Solutions for tough targets  efficient pathways to progress
